description: This file defines a custom exception class 'SimpleBankingGlobalException' for global error handling in the Java-based internet banking application.

classes.name: SimpleBankingGlobalException
classes.description: A custom runtime exception class for global error handling, including additional fields for error code and message.

methods.name: SimpleBankingGlobalException(String message)
methods.description: Constructor initializing the exception with a message.
